name: Place for Hero
description: Place for Hero is a game where you are not looking for adventure, but they find you. Players will find a small, cozy world full of surprises. You play as a Shepherd who is in search of a runaway Sheep. Along the way, you will learn the history of a small, wooded village and its unusual inhabitants. You will meet with unusual characters and insidious opponents. You will be immersed in an interesting, dynamic story, at the end of which you will find an unexpected denouement.
